title: Lee Sin and Jarvan IV Every Single Game
body:
https://i.imgflip.com/gau18.jpg

Seriously, I am so tired of seeing J4 vs Lee every ranked game, and I have so many other priority bans. Can we get other junglers on tier again please?

replies.body:
Lee Sin will get a love tap and 10 junglers will get gutted.

Lee fanboys will go "OMFG LEE GOT NURFED HARD" and wont be touched for another year while remaining #1.
Lee sin is lee sin. Jarv is just flavor of the month

> [{quoted}](name=Tisio,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=yyd15GRY,comment-id=00000001,timestamp=2015-01-12T16:55:35.859+0000)
>
> rofl the fucking denial

It is true though, t the moment, Jarvan is one of the few junglers who can keep up with Lee sin, so he is flavor of the month right now.
Other junglers such as Evelyn, Elise, Warwick, all were gutted, and other junglers can't keep up with Lee sin right now.

> [{quoted}](name=Annoth84,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=yyd15GRY,comment-id=000000010000,timestamp=2015-01-12T16:58:01.109+0000)
>
> It is true though, t the moment, Jarvan is one of the few junglers who can keep up with Lee sin, so he is flavor of the month right now.
> Other junglers such as Evelyn, Elise, Warwick, all were gutted, and other junglers can't keep up with Lee sin right now.

FotM in all servers does say something

> [{quoted}](name=IS1a442cd69a169ed293a39,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=yyd15GRY,comment-id=0000000100000001,timestamp=2015-01-12T17:41:14.555+0000)
>
> FotM in all servers does say something

Why do you think its called FotM?
Keep up? J4 is much better than Lee Sin. I'd take J4 over Lee any day.

> [{quoted}](name=Annoth84,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=yyd15GRY,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2015-01-12T14:53:29.675+0000)
>
> Lee sin is lee sin. Jarv is just flavor of the month

I didn't say anything beyond pick rate.

Only Reason J4 is so popular is because he can actually keep up with Lee.

As usual, Lee Sin is the common denominator in this problem.
Don't even know why people ban Fiddle, he's only good when late game come
Jungle diversity is a serious problem.  I try to play other things but honestly it's obvious what you should be doing.
Not in all my games they arent...
Vi is far better than Lee right now so I don't see the problem.
